mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id, pwd, name, phone, email, regdate, completed_todo, uncompleted_todo) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update tb_user set uncompleted_todo = uncompleted_todo + 1 where no = #{value}
update tb_user set uncompleted_todo = uncompleted_todo - 1 where no = #{value}
update tb_user set completed_todo = completed_todo + 1 where no = #{value}
update tb_user set completed_todo = completed_todo - 1 where no = #{value}
